snippet.title: Twin Peaks: Into the Night  - PSX Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
Download the demo here:
https://blueroseteam.itch.io/twin-peaks-into-the-night

February 24th, 1989. This morning, in the town of Twin Peaks, Washington, a dead body is discovered down by the shore. Wrapped in plastic.
When special agent Dale Cooper is called out to investigate on the recent murder of homecoming queen Laura Palmer, mysterious events begin to occur.

Created as an hommage to good old 90s games classic, Twin Peaks: Into the Night is a fan game adaptation of the eponymous series created by Mark Frost and David Lynch.
Have a taste of a new gameplay experience that will immerse you directly into the unique atmosphere of the show.

"That gameplay you like is going to come back in style."

Follow the project here:
https://twitter.com/BlueRoseTeamTP
https://www.instagram.com/blueroseteamtp/

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

This is a fan game based on the intellectual property of Twin Peaks, and is not meant for sale in any way. Blue Rose Team does not own the rights of the series. Neither David Lynch nor Mark Forst are affiliatied with this project.
All rights reserved to their respective owners.

Marketing of this software is strictly prohibited.

#twinpeaks #psx #dalecooper #playstation #
